EmailTemplate.name: TM Filed on Customer's Behalf
EmailTemplate.subject: TM Filed on Customer's Behalf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom!
We have made several attempts to contact you regarding your Trademark application. However, because we had not received a sufficient response, your application has been processed with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO).
As indicated in our last email, if we have not received a response within 10 days, your application would be filed on your behalf. This email is to inform you that your Trademark application has been filed on your behalf today.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
LegalZoom {!snippetVariable.ipdtm_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
